title: A Generic Approach to Integrating Time into Spatial-Temporal Forecasting via Conditional Neural Fields. (arXiv:2305.06827v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Self-awareness is the key capability of autonomous systems, e.g., autonomous driving network, which relies on highly efficient time series forecasting algorithm to enable the system to reason about the future state of the environment, as well as its effect on the system behavior as time progresses. Recently, a large number of forecasting algorithms using either convolutional neural networks or graph neural networks have been developed to exploit the complex temporal and spatial dependencies present in the time series. While these solutions have shown significant advantages over statistical approaches, one open question is to effectively incorporate the global information which represents the seasonality patterns via the time component of time series into the forecasting models to improve their accuracy. This paper presents a general approach to integrating the time component into forecasting models. The main idea is to employ conditional neural fields to represent the auxiliary feature

translated_title: 通过条件神经场在时空预测中将时间融入到通用方法中
translated_abstract: 自我意识是自主系统的关键能力，例如自主驾驶网络，需要高效的时间序列预测算法，使系统能够推断环境的未来状态以及其随时间推移对系统行为的影响。最近，大量利用卷积神经网络和图神经网络的预测算法已被开发出来，以利用时间序列中存在的复杂时空依赖关系。虽然这些解决方案在统计方法上显示出了显著的优势，但一个未解决的问题是如何有效地将表示季节性模式的全局信息通过时间序列的时间组件整合到预测模型中以提高其精度。本文提出了一种将时间组件融入预测模型的通用方法。其主要思想是使用条件神经场来表示辅助特征。
tldr: 本文提出了一种将时间组件融入预测模型的通用方法，通过使用条件神经场来表示辅助特征，解决了在利用时间序列进行预测时存在的一个未解决问题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a general approach to integrating the time component into forecasting models by employing conditional neural fields to represent auxiliary features, addressing an open question in time series forecasting of effectively incorporating global information representing seasonality patterns into forecasting models.
